description: In the final chapter of the Bottom Diaries we have an interview with Dylan about his secret jock fantasy with a fellow student. Dylan describes in detail to us about how sexy Troy is and how much he wants to be taken by him. Dylan has been watching Phillip practice by himself at the park, all the while fantasizing about him walking into his dorm room to tell him that he has had a secret crush on him and now wants to make it reality. This latest installment of the Bottom Diaries will make you cum all over yourself has Dylan's young soft voice explains the fantasy in detail. Enjoy!
title: Bottom Diaries Chapter 4
